title: Strategies for oxidative synthesis of N-triflyl sulfoximines
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30836-30843
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04992F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Žan Testen, Marjan Jereb
Using different oxidation systems, a large number of N-triflylsulfoximines have been synthesized, some of which have been further functionalized.
